## helper functions

```{r}
mm.f1.fun <- function(task, model, pred, feats, extra.args) {
  # scikit-learn f1 score
  sk$metrics$f1_score(y_true = getPredictionTruth(pred), 
                      y_pred = getPredictionResponse(pred), 
                      average = extra.args$average)
}
micro.f1 <- makeMeasure(id = "micro.f1", name = "micro f1 score", 
                     minimize = FALSE, 
                     properties = c("classif", "classif.multi", "multilabel"),
                     best = 1, worst = 0, fun = mm.f1.fun,
                     extra.args = list(average = "micro"))
macro.f1 <- makeMeasure(id = "macro.f1", name = "macro f1 score", 
                     minimize = FALSE, 
                     properties = c("classif", "classif.multi", "multilabel"),
                     best = 1, worst = 0, fun = mm.f1.fun,
                     extra.args = list(average = "macro"))

as_embed_df <- function(embed_mat, label) {
  # convert matrix to embedding tibble with multiclass label
  as_data_frame(embed_mat) %>% 
    cbind(label) %>%
    select(-V1)
}

as_embed_ml_df <- function(embed_df) {
  # convert multiclass labeled embedding tibble with multilabel indicators
  nlabel <- nlevels(embed_df$label)
  embed_ml_df <- embed_df %>% 
    mutate(i = TRUE) %>% 
    spread(label, i, fill = FALSE)
  return(embed_ml_df)
}
```

## Flickr data

```{r flickr}
flickr_dat <- readMat("true_line_flickr.mat")
flickr_rns_002_dat <- readMat("rns_002_flickr.mat")
flickr_rns_005_dat <- readMat("rns_005_flickr.mat")

flickr_I_embed <- flickr_dat$LINEtypeIFlicker
flickr_II_embed <- flickr_dat$LINEtypeIIFlicker
flickr_rns_I_embed <- flickr_rns_002_dat$rns002typeIFlicker
flickr_rns_II_embed <- flickr_rns_002_dat$rns002typeIIFlicker
flickr_rns_005_I_embed <- flickr_rns_005_dat$rns005typeIFlicker
flickr_rns_005_II_embed <- flickr_rns_005_dat$rns005typeIIFlicker
flickr_label <- as.factor(flickr_dat$Label)

# LINE paper embeddings
flickr_I_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_I_embed, flickr_label)
flickr_II_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_II_embed, flickr_label)

flickr_I_dat_ml <- as_embed_ml_df(flickr_I_dat)
colnames(flickr_I_dat_ml)[101:109] %<>% paste0("class_", .)
flickr_II_dat_ml <- as_embed_ml_df(flickr_II_dat)
colnames(flickr_II_dat_ml)[101:109] %<>% paste0("class_", .)

# RNS embeddings
flickr_rns_I_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_rns_I_embed, flickr_label)
flickr_rns_II_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_rns_II_embed, flickr_label)
flickr_rns_005_I_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_rns_005_I_embed, flickr_label)
flickr_rns_005_II_dat <- as_embed_df(flickr_rns_005_II_embed, flickr_label)

flickr_rns_I_dat_ml <- as_embed_ml_df(flickr_rns_I_dat)
colnames(flickr_rns_I_dat_ml)[101:109] %<>% paste0("class_", .)
flickr_rns_II_dat_ml <- as_embed_ml_df(flickr_rns_II_dat)
colnames(flickr_rns_II_dat_ml)[101:109] %<>% paste0("class_", .)
```

## classification settings

```{r class settings}
# L2 penalized logistic regression
l2logreg_learner <- makeLearner("classif.LiblineaRL2LogReg", predict.type = "response")
```

## Flickr multiclass

```{r flickr multiclass}
flickr_I_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_I_dat, target = "label")
flickr_II_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_II_dat, target = "label")
flickr_rns_I_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_rns_I_dat, target = "label")
flickr_rns_II_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_rns_II_dat, target = "label")
flickr_rns_005_I_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_rns_005_I_dat, target = "label")
flickr_rns_005_II_task <- makeClassifTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_rns_005_II_dat, target = "label")

flickr_desc = makeResampleDesc(method = "Subsample", stratify = FALSE, 
                         iters = 10, split = 3/25)

flickr_I_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_I_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))
flickr_II_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_II_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))
flickr_rns_I_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_rns_I_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))
flickr_rns_II_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_rns_II_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))
flickr_rns_005_I_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_rns_005_I_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))
flickr_rns_005_II_resample = resample(learner = l2logreg_learner, task = flickr_rns_005_II_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(micro.f1, macro.f1))

flickr_I_resample
flickr_II_resample
flickr_rns_I_resample
flickr_rns_II_resample
flickr_rns_005_I_resample
flickr_rns_005_II_resample
```


## multi label classification

#### classification settings

```{r flickr_settings}
flickr_svm <- makeLearner("classif.xgboost", predict.type = "response") %>%
  makeMultilabelBinaryRelevanceWrapper()
flickr_desc = makeResampleDesc(method = "Subsample", stratify = FALSE, 
                         iters = 20, split = 20/100)
```

#### Flickr Data, multilabel, LINE embedding

```{r line}
flickr_I_task <- makeMultilabelTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_I_dat_ml, 
                                    target = paste0("class_", 1:9))
flickr_II_task <- makeMultilabelTask(id = "multi", data = flickr_II_dat_ml, 
                                     target = paste0("class_", 1:9))

flickr_I_resample = resample(learner = flickr_svm, task = flickr_I_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(multilabel.f1))
flickr_II_resample = resample(learner = flickr_svm, task = flickr_II_task, 
                             resampling = flickr_desc, 
                             show.info = FALSE, measures = list(multilabel.f1))

flickr_I_resample
flickr_II_resample
```
